message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $140 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $140 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $135 for the product. I hope this meets your requirements.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $135 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $130. If you're willing to consider that, we can close the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. Considering the value and benefits of the product, I'm willing to accept $130 as the final price. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
